items.boxLabel: #if installed, all material records will be displayed regardless of their type
items.name: all

items.tooltip: #The language (if selected) will be automatically added to the site material
items.name: tabAttributes[language]

items.tooltip: #The site content URL display view (if selected) will be automatically added to the site content and will be hidden when the content form is displayed
items.name: tabAttributes[slugType]

items.tooltip: #The category (section) of the site material (if selected) will be automatically added to the site material and will be hidden when the material form is displayed
items.name: tabAttributes[category]

items.fieldLabel: #on the main page of the site
items.name: tabAttributes[publishOnMain]
